metadata.synopsis: Shadowheart comments on how she is resistant to the first layer of the curse.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Go to SCL2. Stand in an area with the shadow curse but not with shadow blight

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.text: I can feel the shadows' power here... but they don't seem to be harming me?
0.context: NodeContext: Some confusion. She seems to have resistance in a shadow-cursed environment  that's affecting all others.
